events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The system identified the customer's message as a refund request based on keywords related to money back and wrong item.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund case reported by the customer for further assistance.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so that we can verify the issue quickly?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 879432 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
We have verified your order details and the product photo. You are eligible for a full refund or an exchange. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to get the refund, thank you. Please process it as soon as possible so I can receive my money back.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
